title: Collaborate on a Data-Driven Story
description: A reporter and a data journalist are collaborating on a story. They need a shared space to work on the data, analysis, and draft.

tasks.description: Create a new shared project folder for the story.
tasks.expected_outcome: A central repository for all story-related files is created.

tasks.description: Upload the raw dataset and the data analysis script to the shared folder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Both team members can access the data and the code.

tasks.description: Create a shared document for the story draft, allowing for simultaneous editing and commenting.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter and data journalist can write and edit the story together in real time.
